title: MAA Centennial Park
address: 305 Centennial Olympic Park Dr NW, Atlanta, GA 30313
description: MAA Centennial Park is a beautiful apartment complex located in the heart of Atlanta, Georgia. Situated in the vibrant Centennial Park neighborhood, residents have easy access to a wide range of amenities and attractions. The spacious units feature a variety of floor plans, including traditional 1x1 and 2x2 layouts. With sizes ranging from 713 to 1,196 square feet, there is a suitable option for everyone. The complex offers a range of rental prices, starting from $1,665 per month for a 718 square foot unit. Residents can enjoy the convenience of on-site parking and the pet-friendly community. With its prime location and excellent amenities, MAA Centennial Park is the perfect place to call home.
